workoutDescription: Build strong legs like Kratos
Jump around like Mario
Agility, core strength, and explosive movement like the intergalactic bounty hunter herself
text: 20 Jump rope or simulated rope hops
banded punches or explosive push ups: 15 each arm
inverted rows or bent-over rows: 12 reps
jumping lunges or step-back lunges: 10 each leg
plank with alternating shoulder taps: 1 minute

workoutDescription: Lower-body power, explosive agility, balance, and fighter endurance.
text: Reverse Lunge, hold top knee 2 sec: 10 each leg

workoutDescription: Mobility, core strength, and full-body conditioning for any hero’s quest
text: Dynamic Warm-Up: 5 mins jog or jump rope
Lunges with Twist: 3 x 10 each side
Overhead Dumbbell Swings (Master Sword style): 3 x 12

workoutDescription: High-intensity training to tear through demons and fat alike
text: Circuit (4 Rounds, 30 sec on / 15 sec rest):

workoutDescription: Functional strength, stealthy mobility, and endurance under pressure
text: Cool Down: Forward fold, pigeon stretch, deep squat hold

workoutDescription: Quick and electric bodyweight plyometrics to build speed and agility
Heavy strength and endurance training worthy of a Spartan-II supersoldier
text: Superset 1: Deadlifts + Push-Ups – 3 x (5 Deadlifts + 15 Push-Ups)
Superset 2: Pull-Ups + Bulgarian Split Squats – 3 x (10 Pull-Ups + 8 each leg)
Superset 3: Plank Rows + Jump Squats – 3 x (10 Rows + 10 Jumps)
Cooldown: 5 mins stretching and breath work

workoutDescription: Functional strength, core power, and agility like an adventurer on the move
text: Warm-Up: Jump rope 2 mins + dynamic stretches
Bulgarian Split Squats: 3 x 8 each leg
Side Planks with Hip Lifts: 3 x 10 each side
Cool Down: Stretch glutes, hip flexors, abs

workoutDescription: Speed, agility, and cardio to keep up with the fastest thing alive
text: Sprint Intervals: 6 rounds of 20 sec sprint / 40 sec walk
Agility Ladder or Cone Drills: 10 minutes

workoutDescription: Discipline-focused strength, balance, and explosive power for martial arts conditioning
text: Reverse Lunges with Knee Drive: 3 x 10 each leg
Jumping Front Kicks (air): 3 x 10 each leg
Plank Hold with Fists: 3 x 45 sec
Cool Down: Slow breathing + static stretches

workoutDescription: Gentle full-body movement for a peaceful island life
text: Standing Knee Raises: 2 x 10 each side

workoutDescription: Light core work and body movement that even Kirby can float through

workoutDescription: A short, low-impact routine for boosting energy without exhausting your mushrooms
text: Cool Down: Gentle walk or seated breathing

workoutDescription: Speed, agility, and killer reflexes inspired by the cybernetic ninja from Metal Gear

workoutDescription: Mobility, raw strength, and combat readiness like a monster-slaying legend

workoutDescription: A tech-inspired bodyweight circuit for fast, high-energy bursts of strength and endurance
